short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Gmail plus addressing for greater control over your inbox and unlimited alias email addresses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GmailPlusEmails enhances your Gmail experience by harnessing the power of Gmail's native plus addressing feature. With GmailPlusEmails, managing multiple email addresses is a breeze. Simply right-click to insert a dynamic email alias directly into any form field. 

Inspired by Google's hidden gem (https://gmail.googleblog.com/2008/03/2-hidden-ways-to-get-more-from-your.html), GmailPlus makes it easy to organize and filter your inbox, monitor privacy, and streamline email management.

All data is securely stored locally, ensuring your information remains private.
